amendment.description: Amendments en bloc sought to exempt from the provisions of the bill Federal laws which provide for the protection of the health of children.
amendment.purpose: An amendment (comprised of amendments numbered 91 and 92 as printed in the Congressional Record) to provide that the bill would not apply to laws or regulations protecting the health of children.

action.text: On agreeing to the Maloney amendments (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 161 - 261 (Roll no. 35).
